volar-language-features-2.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

volar.icon.preview.description: Show Vite / Nuxt App preview icon.

enumDescriptions: Auto enable take over mode when built-in TS extension disabled.

volar-language-features.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

volar-document-features.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

volar.preview.port.description: Default port for component preview server.

volar.icon.splitEditors.description: Show split editor icon in title area of editor.

volar.vueserver.textDocumentSync.description: Defines how the host (editor) should sync document changes to the language server. SFC incremental parser only working when config "incremental".
enumDescriptions: Documents are synced by sending the full content on open. After that only incremental updates to the document are send.
Documents are synced by always sending the full content of the document.
Documents should not be synced at all.

volar.completion.autoImportComponent.description: Enabled auto-import for component with tag completion.

volar.autoWrapParentheses.description: Auto-wrap `()` to As Expression in interpolations for fix issue #520.

volar.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabled.description: Enabled update imports on file move.

volar.vueserver.useSecondServer.description: Use second server to progress heavy diagnostic works, the main server workhorse computing intellisense, operations such as auto-complete can respond faster. Note that this will lead to more memory usage.

volar.vueserver.maxOldSpaceSize.description: Set --max-old-space-size option on server process. If you have problem on frequently "Request textDocument/** failed." error, try setting higher memory(MB) on it.
